front.title: Use Identity as Raw Public Key in EAP-TLS

abstract.t: This document specifies the use of identity as a raw public key in EAP-TLS both for TLS1.2 and TLS1.3, EAP-TLS for TLS1.2 is defined in RFC 5216 and EAP-TLS for TLS1.3 is defined in the draft draft-ietf- emu-eap-tls13 and draft-ietf-tls-dtls13. The protocol procedures of EAP-TLS-IBS will consistent with EAP-TLS's interactive process, Identity-based signature will be extended to support EAP-TLS's signature algorithms.
